comments.body: Nit: remove `effectively` in this and the next line
Removed in the second line. The first line without it isn't actually true per-se.

diffHunk:

  * collaborators are effectively part owners

comments.body: Maybe note that you should specify the time zone or maybe even note that you should always provide a UTC time?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +88,92 @@        * It may help to set time limits and expectations:
          * the collaborators are very distributed so it is unlikely that they will be looking at stuff the same time as you are.
          * before merging code: give folks at least one working day to respond: "If no one objects, tomorrow at <time> I'll merge this in."
            * please always either specify your timezone, or use UTC time
            * set reminders
